title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in billion U.S. dollars, with a total of 13 data points.
Overall Revenue in billion U.S. dollars has increased over the Year
Revenue in billion U.S. dollars is gradually constant from 2006 to 2018.
The steepest stays the same occurs in between the Year 2008 and 2009.

Min Revenue in billion U.S. dollars about 11.38 was recorded at Year 2006
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in billion U.S. dollars, with a total of 13 data points. The chart has 4 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2009 to 2014.
Additionally, the next significant trend is moderately increasing which exists from 2006 to 2009.
Similarly, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2016 to 2018.
Differently, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2014 to 2016.
